all_tests: select test.*, mctool_name_name as project from test inner join mctool_name on test.mctool_name_id = mctool_name.mctool_name_id
test_by_id: select test.*, mctool_name_name as project from test inner join mctool_name on test.mctool_name_id = mctool_name.mctool_name_id where test.test_id = $1
plot_by_id: select plot_id from plot where test_id = $1 group by plot_id
plots_by_test_version: select plot_id from plot inner join test on plot.test_id = test.test_id inner join mctool_name_version on plot.mctool_name_version_id = mctool_name_version.mctool_name_version_id where test.test_name = $1 and mctool_name_version.version = $2
plot_id_by_all_params: select plot_id from plot inner join target on target.target_id = plot.target inner join mctool_name_version on mctool_name_version.mctool_name_version_id = plot.mctool_name_version_id inner join mctool_model on mctool_model.mctool_model_id = plot.mctool_model_id inner join particle as particle_sec on particle_sec.pdgid = plot.secondary_pdgid inner join particle as particle_beam on particle_beam.pdgid = plot.beam_particle_pdgid inner join observable on observable.observable_id = plot.observable_id where plot.test_id = ANY($1) and target.target_name similar to $2 and mctool_name_version.mctool_name_version_id = ANY($3) and mctool_model.mctool_model_name = ANY($4) and particle_sec.particle_name = ANY($5) and observable.observable_name = ANY($6) and particle_beam.particle_name = ANY($7)
exception_data_by_version_and_particle: select exception.exception_id, exception.mctool_name_version_id, exception.target_id, exception.mctool_model_id, exception.beam_particle_pdgid, exception.beam_energy, exception.exception_groups, exception.exception_counts, exception.test_id, target.target_name, mctool_model.mctool_model_name from exception inner join mctool_name_version on exception.mctool_name_version_id = mctool_name_version.mctool_name_version_id inner join particle on particle.pdgid = exception.beam_particle_pdgid inner join mctool_model on exception.mctool_model_id = mctool_model.mctool_model_id inner join target on exception.target_id = target.target_id where mctool_name_version.mctool_name_version_id = $1 and lower(particle.particle_name) = lower($2)
exception_text_by_id: select exception.exception_groups, exception.exception_text from exception where exception_id = $1
get_id_hint: select plot_id from plot where plot_id::text like $1 limit 15
online_menu_filter: select plot.mctool_name_version_id, p1.particle_name as p1name, mctool_model.mctool_model_name, target.target_name, p2.particle_name as p2name, observable.observable_name, plot.beam_energy as benergies from plot inner join particle as p1 on p1.pdgid = plot.beam_particle_pdgid inner join particle as p2 on p2.pdgid = plot.secondary_pdgid inner join mctool_model on mctool_model.mctool_model_id = plot.mctool_model_id inner join target on target.target_id = plot.target inner join observable on observable.observable_id = plot.observable_id where plot.test_id = $1
distinct_tool_version_menu_filter: select distinct plot.mctool_name_version_id from plot inner join particle as p1 on p1.pdgid = plot.beam_particle_pdgid inner join particle as p2 on p2.pdgid = plot.secondary_pdgid inner join mctool_model on mctool_model.mctool_model_id = plot.mctool_model_id inner join target on target.target_id = plot.target inner join observable on observable.observable_id = plot.observable_id where plot.test_id = $1
distinct_particle_name_menu_filter: select distinct p1.particle_name as p1name from plot inner join particle as p1 on p1.pdgid = plot.beam_particle_pdgid inner join particle as p2 on p2.pdgid = plot.secondary_pdgid inner join mctool_model on mctool_model.mctool_model_id = plot.mctool_model_id inner join target on target.target_id = plot.target inner join observable on observable.observable_id = plot.observable_id where plot.test_id = $1
distinct_model_name_menu_filter: select distinct mctool_model.mctool_model_name from plot inner join particle as p1 on p1.pdgid = plot.beam_particle_pdgid inner join particle as p2 on p2.pdgid = plot.secondary_pdgid inner join mctool_model on mctool_model.mctool_model_id = plot.mctool_model_id inner join target on target.target_id = plot.target inner join observable on observable.observable_id = plot.observable_id where plot.test_id = $1
distinct_target_name_menu_filter: select distinct target.target_name from plot inner join particle as p1 on p1.pdgid = plot.beam_particle_pdgid inner join particle as p2 on p2.pdgid = plot.secondary_pdgid inner join mctool_model on mctool_model.mctool_model_id = plot.mctool_model_id inner join target on target.target_id = plot.target inner join observable on observable.observable_id = plot.observable_id where plot.test_id = $1
distinct_secondary_particle_menu_filter: select distinct p2.particle_name as p2name from plot inner join particle as p1 on p1.pdgid = plot.beam_particle_pdgid inner join particle as p2 on p2.pdgid = plot.secondary_pdgid inner join mctool_model on mctool_model.mctool_model_id = plot.mctool_model_id inner join target on target.target_id = plot.target inner join observable on observable.observable_id = plot.observable_id where plot.test_id = $1
distinct_observable_menu_filter: select distinct observable.observable_name from plot inner join particle as p1 on p1.pdgid = plot.beam_particle_pdgid inner join particle as p2 on p2.pdgid = plot.secondary_pdgid inner join mctool_model on mctool_model.mctool_model_id = plot.mctool_model_id inner join target on target.target_id = plot.target inner join observable on observable.observable_id = plot.observable_id where plot.test_id = $1
distinct_beam_energy_menu_filter: select distinct plot.beam_energy_str as benergies from plot inner join particle as p1 on p1.pdgid = plot.beam_particle_pdgid inner join particle as p2 on p2.pdgid = plot.secondary_pdgid inner join mctool_model on mctool_model.mctool_model_id = plot.mctool_model_id inner join target on target.target_id = plot.target inner join observable on observable.observable_id = plot.observable_id where plot.test_id = $1
all_exception_tests: select distinct test.* from test inner join exception on exception.test_id = test.test_id inner join particle on particle.pdgid = exception.beam_particle_pdgid inner join mctool_model on exception.mctool_model_id = mctool_model.mctool_model_id inner join target on exception.target_id = target.target_id
exceptions_mctool_name_version_id_by_tes: select distinct exception.mctool_name_version_id from test inner join exception on exception.test_id = test.test_id inner join particle on particle.pdgid = exception.beam_particle_pdgid inner join mctool_model on exception.mctool_model_id = mctool_model.mctool_model_id inner join target on exception.target_id = target.target_id where test.test_id=$1
exceptions_mctool_name_version_by_test_i: select distinct mctool_name_version.version from test inner join exception on exception.test_id = test.test_id inner join particle on particle.pdgid = exception.beam_particle_pdgid inner join mctool_model on exception.mctool_model_id = mctool_model.mctool_model_id inner join target on exception.target_id = target.target_id inner join mctool_name_version on exception.mctool_name_version_id = mctool_name_version.mctool_name_version_id where test.test_id=$1
exceptions_mctool_name_name_by_test_id: select mctool_name.mctool_name_name from test inner join exception on exception.test_id = test.test_id inner join particle on particle.pdgid = exception.beam_particle_pdgid inner join mctool_model on exception.mctool_model_id = mctool_model.mctool_model_id inner join target on exception.target_id = target.target_id inner join mctool_name_version on exception.mctool_name_version_id = mctool_name_version.mctool_name_version_id inner join mctool_name on mctool_name_version.mctool_name_id = mctool_name.mctool_name_id where test.test_id=$1
exceptions_particle_name_by_test_id: select distinct particle.particle_name from test inner join exception on exception.test_id = test.test_id inner join particle on particle.pdgid = exception.beam_particle_pdgid inner join mctool_model on exception.mctool_model_id = mctool_model.mctool_model_id inner join target on exception.target_id = target.target_id where test.test_id=$1
exceptions_version_info_by_test_id: select distinct mctool_name.mctool_name_name,mctool_name_version.version,exception.mctool_name_version_id from test inner join exception on exception.test_id = test.test_id inner join particle on particle.pdgid = exception.beam_particle_pdgid inner join mctool_model on exception.mctool_model_id = mctool_model.mctool_model_id inner join target on exception.target_id = target.target_id inner join mctool_name_version on exception.mctool_name_version_id = mctool_name_version.mctool_name_version_id inner join mctool_name on mctool_name_version.mctool_name_id = mctool_name.mctool_name_id where test.test_id=$1
compare_tool_name_and_version: select distinct p1.mctool_name_version_id,mctool_name.mctool_name_id, CONCAT(mctool_name.mctool_name_name,' ',mctool_name_version.version) as version from plot p1,plot p2,stat,mctool_name_version,mctool_name,mctool_model where p1.plot_id = stat.id0 and p2.plot_id = stat.id1 and mctool_model.mctool_model_id = p1.mctool_model_id and mctool_name_version.mctool_name_version_id = p1.mctool_name_version_id and mctool_name.mctool_name_id = mctool_name_version.mctool_name_id and p2.test_id = 102 and stat.chi2 != 'NaN' order by version;
compare_model_by_tool: select distinct mctool_model.mctool_model_id, mctool_model.mctool_model_name,p1.mctool_name_version_id as version_id from mctool_model,mctool_name,plot p1,plot p2, stat where mctool_name.mctool_name_id = mctool_model.mctool_name_id and p1.plot_id = stat.id0 and p2.plot_id = stat.id1 and stat.chi2 != 'NaN' and p1.mctool_name_version_id = $1 and p1.mctool_model_id = mctool_model.mctool_model_id
compare_particle: select distinct particle.particle_name,particle.pdgid from particle inner join plot on plot.beam_particle_pdgid = particle.pdgid
compare_test: select distinct test.test_name,test.test_id from test inner join plot on plot.test_id = test.test_id
compare_compare_experimental: select distinct p1.mctool_name_version_id, test.test_name,sum(stat.chi2),max(stat.chi2),min(stat.chi2),avg(stat.chi2) from plot p1,plot p2,stat,test where test.test_id = p1.test_id and p2.test_id = 102 and p2.plot_id = stat.id1 and p1.plot_id = stat.id0 and p1.beam_energy = p2.beam_energy and p1.target = p2.target and p1.observable_id = p2.observable_id and p1.secondary_pdgid = p2.secondary_pdgid and p1.beam_particle_pdgid = p2.beam_particle_pdgid and p1.plot_id != p2.plot_id and p1.mctool_name_version_id != p2.mctool_name_version_id and p1.parnames = p2.parnames and p1.parvalues = p2.parvalues and p1.mctool_name_version_id = $1 and p1.mctool_model_id = $2 and p1.plot_id = stat.id0 and p2.plot_id = stat.id1 and p1.beam_particle_pdgid = ANY($3) and p1.test_id = $4 and p2.beam_particle_pdgid = ANY($3) and stat.chi2 !='NaN' group by p1.mctool_name_version_id,p1.mctool_model_id,test.test_name ;
compare_compare_experimental_all_tests: select distinct p1.mctool_name_version_id,sum(stat.chi2),max(stat.chi2),min(stat.chi2),avg(stat.chi2) from plot p1,plot p2,stat,test where test.test_id = p1.test_id and p2.test_id = 102 and p2.plot_id = stat.id1 and p1.plot_id = stat.id0 and p1.beam_energy = p2.beam_energy and p1.target = p2.target and p1.observable_id = p2.observable_id and p1.secondary_pdgid = p2.secondary_pdgid and p1.beam_particle_pdgid = p2.beam_particle_pdgid and p1.plot_id != p2.plot_id and p1.mctool_name_version_id != p2.mctool_name_version_id and p1.parnames = p2.parnames and p1.parvalues = p2.parvalues and p1.mctool_name_version_id = $1 and p1.mctool_model_id = $2 and p1.plot_id = stat.id0 and p2.plot_id = stat.id1 and p1.beam_particle_pdgid = ANY($3) and p1.test_id = ANY($4) and p2.beam_particle_pdgid = ANY($3) and stat.chi2 !='NaN' group by p1.mctool_name_version_id,p1.mctool_model_id ;
compare_tool_name_and_version_all: select distinct plot.mctool_name_version_id,mctool_name.mctool_name_id, CONCAT(mctool_name.mctool_name_name,' ',mctool_name_version.version) as version from plot inner join mctool_name_version on mctool_name_version.mctool_name_version_id = plot.mctool_name_version_id inner join mctool_name on mctool_name.mctool_name_id = mctool_name_version.mctool_name_id where plot.mctool_model_id != -1 and plot.plot_id in (select distinct id0 from stat union select distinct id1 from stat) order by version;
compare_compare: select mctool_name_version_id,test_name,sum(chi2),max(chi2),min(chi2),avg(chi2) from( select distinct p1.mctool_name_version_id, test.test_name,stat.chi2 from plot p1,plot p2,stat,test where p1.plot_id = stat.id0 and p2.plot_id = stat.id1 and p1.plot_id != p2.plot_id and p1.mctool_name_version_id = $1 and p1.mctool_model_id = $2 and p1.beam_particle_pdgid = ANY($3) and p1.test_id = $4 and p2.mctool_name_version_id = $5 and p2.mctool_model_id = $6 and p1.test_id = test.test_id and stat.chi2!='NaN' union select distinct p1.mctool_name_version_id, test.test_name,stat.chi2 from plot p1,plot p2,stat,test where p2.plot_id = stat.id0 and p1.plot_id = stat.id1 and p1.plot_id != p2.plot_id and p1.mctool_name_version_id = $1 and p1.mctool_model_id = $2 and p1.beam_particle_pdgid = ANY($3) and p1.test_id = $4 and p2.mctool_name_version_id = $5 and p2.mctool_model_id = $6 and p1.test_id = test.test_id and stat.chi2!='NaN' ) as x group by mctool_name_version_id,test_name
compare_compare_all_tests: select mctool_name_version_id,sum(chi2),max(chi2),min(chi2),avg(chi2) from( select distinct p1.mctool_name_version_id,stat.chi2 from plot p1,plot p2,stat,test where p1.plot_id = stat.id0 and p2.plot_id = stat.id1 and p1.plot_id != p2.plot_id and p1.mctool_name_version_id = $1 and p1.mctool_model_id = $2 and p1.beam_particle_pdgid = ANY($3) and p1.test_id = ANY($4) and p2.mctool_name_version_id = $5 and p2.mctool_model_id = $6 and p1.test_id = test.test_id and stat.chi2!='NaN' union select distinct p1.mctool_name_version_id,stat.chi2 from plot p1,plot p2,stat,test where p2.plot_id = stat.id0 and p1.plot_id = stat.id1 and p1.plot_id != p2.plot_id and p1.mctool_name_version_id = $1 and p1.mctool_model_id = $2 and p1.beam_particle_pdgid = ANY($3) and p1.test_id = ANY($4) and p2.mctool_name_version_id = $5 and p2.mctool_model_id = $6 and p1.test_id = test.test_id and stat.chi2!='NaN') as x group by mctool_name_version_id
compare_number_compatible_histograms: select count(*) from( select p2.plot_id from stat,plot p1, plot p2 where p1.plot_id = stat.id0 and p2.plot_id = stat.id1 and p1.mctool_name_version_id = $1 and p1.mctool_model_id = $2 and p2.mctool_name_version_id = $3 and p2.mctool_model_id = $4 union select p2.plot_id from stat,plot p1, plot p2 where p1.plot_id = stat.id1 and p2.plot_id = stat.id0 and p1.mctool_name_version_id = $1 and p1.mctool_model_id = $2 and p2.mctool_name_version_id = $3 and p2.mctool_model_id = $4 ) as x;
compare_package2_tool_name_and_version: select distinct plot.mctool_name_version_id,mctool_name.mctool_name_id, CONCAT(mctool_name.mctool_name_name,' ',mctool_name_version.version) as version from plot inner join mctool_name_version on mctool_name_version.mctool_name_version_id = plot.mctool_name_version_id inner join mctool_name on mctool_name.mctool_name_id = mctool_name_version.mctool_name_id where plot.mctool_model_id != -1 and plot.plot_id in ( select distinct stat.id1 from stat,plot p1, plot p2 where stat.id0 = p1.plot_id and stat.id1 = p2.plot_id and p1.mctool_name_version_id = $1 and p1.mctool_model_id = $2 union select distinct stat.id0 from stat,plot p1, plot p2 where stat.id0 = p2.plot_id and stat.id1 = p1.plot_id and p1.mctool_name_version_id = $1 and p1.mctool_model_id = $2 ) order by version;
compare_package2_model_by_tool: select distinct mctool_model.mctool_model_id, mctool_model.mctool_model_name,p1.mctool_name_version_id as version_id from mctool_model,mctool_name,plot p1,plot p2, stat where mctool_name.mctool_name_id = mctool_model.mctool_name_id and p1.plot_id = stat.id0 and p2.plot_id = stat.id1 and stat.chi2 != 'NaN' and p1.mctool_name_version_id = $1 and p2.mctool_name_version_id = $2 and p2.mctool_model_id = $3 and p1.mctool_model_id = mctool_model.mctool_model_id union select distinct mctool_model.mctool_model_id, mctool_model.mctool_model_name,p1.mctool_name_version_id as version_id from mctool_model,mctool_name,plot p1,plot p2, stat where mctool_name.mctool_name_id = mctool_model.mctool_name_id and p1.plot_id = stat.id1 and p2.plot_id = stat.id0 and stat.chi2 != 'NaN' and p1.mctool_name_version_id = $1 and p2.mctool_name_version_id = $2 and p2.mctool_model_id = $3 and p1.mctool_model_id = mctool_model.mctool_model_id
compare_against_tool_name_and_version: select distinct plot.mctool_name_version_id,mctool_name.mctool_name_id, CONCAT(mctool_name.mctool_name_name,' ',mctool_name_version.version) as version from plot inner join mctool_name_version on mctool_name_version.mctool_name_version_id = plot.mctool_name_version_id inner join mctool_name on mctool_name.mctool_name_id = mctool_name_version.mctool_name_id where plot.mctool_model_id != -1 and plot.plot_id in ( (select distinct stat.id1 from stat,plot p1, plot p2 where stat.id0 = p1.plot_id and stat.id1 = p2.plot_id and p1.mctool_name_version_id = $1 and p1.mctool_model_id = $2 union select distinct stat.id0 from stat,plot p1, plot p2 where stat.id0 = p2.plot_id and stat.id1 = p1.plot_id and p1.mctool_name_version_id = $1 and p1.mctool_model_id = $2) intersect (select distinct stat.id1 from stat,plot p1, plot p2 where stat.id0 = p1.plot_id and stat.id1 = p2.plot_id and p1.mctool_name_version_id = $3 and p1.mctool_model_id = $4 union select distinct stat.id0 from stat,plot p1, plot p2 where stat.id0 = p2.plot_id and stat.id1 = p1.plot_id and p1.mctool_name_version_id = $3 and p1.mctool_model_id = $4) ) order by version;
compare_againts_model_by_tool: (select distinct mctool_model.mctool_model_id, mctool_model.mctool_model_name,p2.mctool_name_version_id as version_id from mctool_model,mctool_name,plot p1,plot p2, stat where mctool_name.mctool_name_id = mctool_model.mctool_name_id and p1.plot_id = stat.id0 and p2.plot_id = stat.id1 and stat.chi2 != 'NaN' and p1.mctool_name_version_id = $1 and p2.mctool_name_version_id = $3 and p2.mctool_model_id = $4 and p1.mctool_model_id = mctool_model.mctool_model_id union select distinct mctool_model.mctool_model_id, mctool_model.mctool_model_name,p2.mctool_name_version_id as version_id from mctool_model,mctool_name,plot p1,plot p2, stat where mctool_name.mctool_name_id = mctool_model.mctool_name_id and p1.plot_id = stat.id1 and p2.plot_id = stat.id0 and stat.chi2 != 'NaN' and p1.mctool_name_version_id = $1 and p2.mctool_name_version_id = $3 and p2.mctool_model_id = $4 and p1.mctool_model_id = mctool_model.mctool_model_id) intersect (select distinct mctool_model.mctool_model_id, mctool_model.mctool_model_name,p2.mctool_name_version_id as version_id from mctool_model,mctool_name,plot p1,plot p2, stat where mctool_name.mctool_name_id = mctool_model.mctool_name_id and p1.plot_id = stat.id0 and p2.plot_id = stat.id1 and stat.chi2 != 'NaN' and p1.mctool_name_version_id = $2 and p2.mctool_name_version_id = $3 and p2.mctool_model_id = $5 and p1.mctool_model_id = mctool_model.mctool_model_id union select distinct mctool_model.mctool_model_id, mctool_model.mctool_model_name,p2.mctool_name_version_id as version_id from mctool_model,mctool_name,plot p1,plot p2, stat where mctool_name.mctool_name_id = mctool_model.mctool_name_id and p1.plot_id = stat.id1 and p2.plot_id = stat.id0 and stat.chi2 != 'NaN' and p1.mctool_name_version_id = $2 and p2.mctool_name_version_id = $3 and p2.mctool_model_id = $5 and p1.mctool_model_id = mctool_model.mctool_model_id)
getchi2: select chi2 from stat where id0 = $1 and id1 = $2 limit 1;
getchi2_insert: insert into stat (id0, id1, chi2) values ($1, $2, $3);
getchi2_update: update stat set chi2=$3 where id0 = $1 and id1 = $2;
